content: Hello! Thanks for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. I’d be happy to help you schedule an electrical service. May I have your name, please?
Why do you need my name? I just want someone to come fix my outlets NOW. I don’t have time for this.
I understand you’d like this done quickly. For our team to help you as fast as possible, I’ll need your name and address to get started. Would you be able to share your address now?
I just told you, I don’t want you wasting my time. Just send someone in the next 10 minutes or I’m calling someone else. 333 Big Street.
Thank you for your address, 333 Big Street. I’ll do my best to help. May I please have your name to finalize the booking? Unfortunately, I can’t dispatch a technician without it.
Ugh. Fine, it’s Mark. But don’t make me fill out anything else—just get someone here at EXACTLY 10:30 or I’ll give you a terrible review.

Thanks, Mark. I’ve checked our schedule and will book the earliest available appointment close to 10:30 AM. I’ll confirm the appointment now. One last thing—would you like a price estimate before I finalize?
